#summary The meaning of each ID used in the SVG-edit language files

Under construction

http://imgh.us/SVG-edit_Languages.svg shows the status of translations for each SVG-edit

language file.

= Introduction =

This page will list the existing ID in the language files, and explain what they "technically" represent, for a meaningful - yet simple - translation of the SVG-edit interface.

<font color="Blue">New ID since the last version</font><br/>
<font color="Green">Active ID</font><br/>
<font color="Orange">ID made obsolete last version</font><br/>
<font color="Red">Obsolete ID</font><br/>
